PerfectNetExp.abs: ...亲缘关系,但爪较弱,头多秃,主要或全部以腐肉为食,构成鹫科(Aegypiidae)和新域鹫科(Cathartidae),其中包括一些最大的飞禽。

means.word_mean: 1. in some classifications considered the family comprising the Old World vultures which are more often included in the family Accipitridae
